_comment_connection: Connection to MeshCore companion node. Set connection_type to 'serial' or 'tcp'.
_comment_reconnect: Auto-reconnect settings for the MeshCore connection.
_comment_bridge: Bidirectional message bridging between Meshtastic and MeshCore.
_comment_commands: Enable command processing for messages received from MeshCore nodes.
_comment_tags: Tags prepended to bridged messages to show their origin network.
_comment_ai: Allow MeshCore users to trigger AI responses via commands.
_comment_filters: Prevent echo loops between the two mesh networks.
